responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "401D53EE445B801D253B36879DDD50FF", "The Harbinger Apocalypse has rendered the Riverlands a wasteland of corruption. Those who did not or could not find refuge beyond the portal have endured horrors from Duzahk. Children have been kidnapped by the Priestess Deliah, a Shedim demoness who has been siphoning the ashes from the youths. We must rally and begin a new crusade.")
name: MADD_0007_BOB_Read_BattleOFBloom_3
